title: 3 Ways a Port Can Become Optimal
text:
PTI has interviewed port industry guru and Director of simulation and emulation specialist TBA Dr Yvo Saanen, asking him to outline 3 practices the contemporary port can employ in order to optimise its operations. This video interview is Part 2 of a popular previous video in which highlighted the burgeoning automated terminal and how its increasing prominence is evolving the landscape of port and terminal operations.
For an in-depth look at how Dr Saanen argues for completing training ‘Confucian style’, read a Technical Paper written by him here .
